description: This file defines the ProductService interface, which declares methods for creating, retrieving, updating, partially updating, and deleting products within the product management backend system.

classes.name: ProductService
classes.description: Service interface for managing product-related business operations, including CRUD and partial updates.

methods.name: createProduct
methods.description: Creates a new product based on the provided ProductRequest.

methods.name: getAllProducts
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all products.

methods.name: getProductById
methods.description: Fetches a product by its unique identifier, throws an exception if not found.

methods.name: updateProduct
methods.description: Performs a full update of an existing product.

methods.name: patchProduct
methods.description: Performs a partial update of an existing product.

methods.name: deleteProduct
methods.description: Deletes a product by its ID.
